name: and would she even see me?
name_original: and would she even see me?
description:
A short Twine game about a space biologist, within the last hour of their life, as they try to come to terms with this fact, as well as what they might be leaving behind. Around 10-20 minutes long depending on if you play through all options.

If you like the game you can follow me on twitter @boywithwindmill or click here.

Credit to the NASA Image & Video Library for the photograph.

CONTENT WARNING:

death, parental death, light discussion of gender, reference to panic attack
